Interface ConnectorInfo

All Superinterfaces:

All Known Subinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
DataSourceConnectorInfo, ExportDumpConnectorInfo, ImportDumpConnectionInfo, URLConnectorInfoImpl
public interface ConnectorInfo
extends Serializable

Information about connectors, in particular, parameters needed to establish a Connection to the data base.
